recommended_degree: Teknologi Komputer, Teknik Komputer Dan Jaringan, Sistem dan Teknologi Informasi, Ilmu Komputer (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Description :
1. Assist with troubleshooting hardware and software issues for employees.
2. Support installation, configuration, and maintenance of IT equipment and applications.
3. Perform routine system checks and help monitor network performance.
4. Help with documentation of IT processes, asset records, and technical guides.
5. Support basic data management tasks, including backups and file organization.
6. Provide on-site or remote technical support under the guidance of senior IT staff.

Requirement :
1. Basic understanding of computer hardware, operating systems, and networking fundamentals.
2. Familiarity with common productivity and troubleshooting tools (e.g., Microsoft Office, basic command-line us-
age).
3. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
4. Effective communication and collaboration skills.
5. Ability to learn quickly and adapt to new technologies.
6. Ability to work effectively in a team.
